_header: Eleven thousand virgins he that will honor
_description: A promise of pardon to all who honour the 11,000 virgins with Pater Nosters and Aves — one 8-line stanza

HunHM140.First Lines:
xl Ml virgyns he that will honourWith so many pater noster and aues
                    therto…
HunHM140.Last Lines:
…May be delyuered fro much care and wooAnd fynd in this lyf
                    much more grace
HunHM140.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.224.
